name: "Order of Jormungandr"  by Kail Pendragon -- lost
author: Schism

posts.author: Schism
posts.content:
Hello there.

I didn't play NWN for a long time. somehow, I found sweet moments of playing this game in memory.
Played some time and started to search interesting builds of others.

Found an interesting combination of druid/monk/cleric and started to investigate the web.
I found that this build was created by Kail Pendragon and it's lost... as well as a huge part of NWN building communities.

(Also I have a suspicion that the build was created before the new DS requirements - 30 WIS)


Does anyone remember this build and can reproduce it?

posts.author: Valerfor
posts.content:
Hello Schism,

I will recommend you to download the legacy archives of the ECB forum, but for this time i will give you the original build itself.
Please have in mind that the build is illegal as of 1.69 patch but to fix it is a simple matter of upping the Druid levels to 18, everything else remains the same.
Spoiler

DEX: 10 WIS: 18 (32) CHA: 8 Hitpoints: 360 Saving Throws (Fortitude/Will/Reflex): 25/35/16 AB (max, naked): 26 (melee), 37 (ranged) Spell Casting: Cleric(9),Druid(7)

LVL BREAKDOWN 02: Druid(2) 04: Druid(4): WIS+1, (WIS=19) 06: Druid(6): Zen Archery 08: Druid(8): WIS+1, (WIS=20) 10: Cleric(2) 12: Cleric(4): WIS+1, Greater Spell Penetration, (WIS=21) 14: Cleric(6) 16: Cleric(8): WIS+1, (WIS=22) 18: Cleric(10): Improved Critical: Unarmed 20: Cleric(12): WIS+1, (WIS=23) 22: Cleric(14) 24: Cleric(16): WIS+1, Great Wisdom II, (WIS=26) 26: Cleric(18) 28: Druid(9): WIS+1, (WIS=28) 30: Druid(11): Great Wisdom IV, (WIS=29) 32: Druid(13): WIS+1, (WIS=30) 34: Cleric(20) 36: Cleric(22): WIS+1, Epic Spell Penetration, (WIS=31) 38: Cleric(24) 40: Cleric(25): WIS+1, (WIS=32)
Also for your convenience, here is where the Legacy ECB Archives can be found. You just DL them to your HD and you open them whenever you want to search for a build.

Legacy ECB Archives =>> https://neverwintervault.org/project/nw ... r-builders

posts.author: Schism
posts.content:
Hi Valerfor,

I don't even know which of these made me happier =)

It took a while to fix search page (No database found: Chrome CORS blocked the search result page).
But finally, I have all of these sweeties.

Thanks a lot!
